typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	emptyLinesAsHeader: 1) ~> sink1
